description: Basic block patterns with common validation fixes - RLHF batch 1

group-basic.name: Basic group with position removal
corrections: removed position style that breaks validation

image-string-dimensions.name: Image with string dimensions (keep as-is)
corrections: string dimensions are actually correct for WordPress

paragraph-invalid-css.name: Paragraph with invalid position/zIndex CSS
corrections: removed position and zIndex - not supported in block styles

button-complex-border.name: Button with complex border object
corrections: complex border objects cause validation issues - remove or simplify
button-complex-border.actualOutput: Button block created but attributes ignored

group-invalid-flex.name: Group with invalid flex properties
corrections: removed flexDirection, gap, and display - not supported
WordPress uses layout.type:flex but limited properties

list-invalid-properties.name: List with unsupported styling
corrections: removed complex padding and listStyle attributes

cover-position-removal.name: Cover block with position removal
corrections: removed position object - causes validation failure

columns-invalid-attributes.name: Columns with invalid properties
corrections: removed blockGap, columns count, and isStackedOnMobile
WordPress handles these through different mechanisms

quote-invalid-border-margin.name: Quote with invalid border and margin
corrections: removed invalid border.left and margin.left properties

commonCorrections.positionRemoval: Remove all position-related styles (relative, absolute, fixed)
commonCorrections.attributeFiltering: Remove unsupported attributes like gap, flexDirection, columns, isStackedOnMobile
commonCorrections.borderSimplification: Complex border objects often fail - use simple border properties or remove
commonCorrections.cssPropertyFiltering: Remove display, z-index, position, and other CSS properties not in WordPress whitelist
commonCorrections.fontWeightNormalization: Convert text font-weight values to numeric (bold â†’ 100)
commonCorrections.emptyContentGeneration: WordPress auto-generates closing tags and basic inner content for empty blocks
commonCorrections.layoutLimitations: Layout.type:flex works but flexDirection, gap in layout object don't
commonCorrections.marginPaddingRestrictions: Complex margin/padding objects often stripped - use simple values

metadata.learningMethod: RLHF - Human feedback on WordPress Gutenberg validation
errorPatterns: Invalid CSS properties in style object
